title: Paris/4th arrondissement
name: la Bastille
content: Enter Bastille station through any entrance or on any train and then make your way to the ''Bobigny/Pablo Picasso''-bound platform. All that's left of the fortress whose front steps used to lead up from ''place de la Bastille'' are some foundation stones which you can see while waiting for a north bound train on this ''metro'' platform. There are maps and explanations showing where the fortress used to be relative the ''place'' and surroundings (basically the location of the old front steps are now occupied by '''Café des Phares''').
